subject: DEAR,
body:
DEAR,
HERE IS THE OFFICE OF INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND IN NEW YORK, WE ARE HERE TO INFORM YOU THAT YOUR FUNDS HAS BEEN APPROVED TO RELEASE, WE ADVISE YOU TO RECONFIRM ALL YOUR INFORMATION  TO AVOID WRONG TRANSFER,
Our address,
One Dag Hammarskjold Plaza 885 Second Avenue,
26th Floor (between 47th and 48th Streets)
New York, NY 10017ur
WE WAIT FOR YOUR QUICK RESPONSE,
REGARDS,
ROBERT RICE

subject: Re:   DEAR,
body:
Dear Robert Rice,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information regarding the approval of my funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the process and how I can proceed with the release of the funds? Additionally, could you clarify what specific information you need me to reconfirm?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Juanita

subject: Re: DEAR,
body:
Dear   Juanita

Here is the bank email address contact them for your payment
Name Ellen Alemany
email  address telex.dept33@aol.com
Regards
Robert Rice

subject: Re: DEAR,
body:
Hello Juanita, thank you for sharing this information. Could you provide more details about the payment process? I would like to know how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Juanita
